member.name: T:OpenDiscoverSDK.PowerShell.GetFileContentCmdlet
member.summary: Identifies a file and extracts document content, and returns this information as a DocumentContent object.
member.remarks: Note: DocumentContent is also the base class for HtmlDocumentContent, PdfDocumentContent, EmailDocumentContent, MailStoreContent, and ArchiveContent classes. This classes hold extra content for their respective format types.

member.name: P:OpenDiscoverSDK.PowerShell.GetFileContentCmdlet.Password
member.summary: Optional password to try for supported password protected formats.

member.name: T:OpenDiscoverSDK.PowerShell.GetFileInfoCmdlet
member.summary: Displays the results of file identification and extracted document metadata, attributes, and hyperlinks for the document given by the 'Path' argument.

member.name: P:OpenDiscoverSDK.PowerShell.GetFileInfoCmdlet.Password
member.summary: Optional password to try for supported password protected formats.

member.name: P:OpenDiscoverSDK.PowerShell.GetFileInfoCmdlet.ShowText
member.summary: If true, shows up to the first 1000 characters of extracted text (if any).

member.name: T:OpenDiscoverSDK.PowerShell.GetFileFormatCmdlet
member.summary: Identifies a file's format and returns the identification IdResult object.
